name: R5-Goal-R4-Goal
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 Goal into FHIR R4

element.display: Describes the intended objective(s) for a patient, group or organization

target.display: Describes the intended objective(s) for a patient, group or organization
target.comment: R5 `Goal` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal`

element.display: in-progress | improving | worsening | no-change | achieved | sustaining | not-achieved | no-progress | not-attainable

target.display: in-progress | improving | worsening | no-change | achieved | sustaining | not-achieved | no-progress | not-attainable
target.comment: R5 `Goal.achievementStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.achievementStatus`
R5 `Goal.addresses` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.addresses` - addresses has change due to type change: R5 `addresses` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `addresses`
R5 `Goal.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.category`
R5 `Goal.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.contained`

element.display: After meeting the goal, ongoing activity is needed to sustain the goal objective

target.comment: R5 `Goal.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.description`
R5 `Goal.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Goal.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.id`
R5 `Goal.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `Goal.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.implicitRules`

R5 `Goal.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `Goal.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: proposed | planned | accepted | active | on-hold | completed | cancelled | entered-in-error | rejected

target.display: proposed | planned | accepted | active | on-hold | completed | cancelled | entered-in-error | rejected
target.comment: R5 `Goal.lifecycleStatus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.lifecycleStatus` - lifecycleStatus has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/goal-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/goal-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
R5 `Goal.meta` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.meta`

R5 `Goal.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`
R5 `Goal.note` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.note` - note has change due to type change: R5 `note` `Annotation` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `note`

target.display: What result was achieved regarding the goal?
target.comment: R5 `Goal.outcome` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.outcomeCode` - outcomeCode has change due to type change: R5 outcome CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 outcomeCode

R5 `Goal.outcome` maps as RelatedTo to R4 `Goal.outcomeReference` - outcomeReference removed a binding requirement - Example http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/clinical-findings; outcomeReference has change due to type change: R5 outcome CodeableReference has no equivalent or mapped type in R4 outcomeReference
R5 `Goal.priority` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.priority`
R5 `Goal.source` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.expressedBy` - expressedBy has change due to type change: R5 `source` `Reference` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `expressedBy`
R5 `Goal.start[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.start[x]`
R5 `Goal.statusDate` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.statusDate`
R5 `Goal.statusReason` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.statusReason`

element.display: Who this goal is intended for

target.display: Who this goal is intended for
target.comment: R5 `Goal.subject` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.subject`
R5 `Goal.target` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.target`

element.display: The target value to be achieved

target.display: The target value to be achieved
target.comment: R5 `Goal.target.detail[x]` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.target.detail[x]` - detail[x] has change due to type change: R5 `detail[x]` `Ratio` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `detail[x]`
R5 `Goal.target.due[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.target.due[x]`

R5 `Goal.target.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.target.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`
R5 `Goal.target.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.target.id`

element.display: The parameter whose value is being tracked

target.display: The parameter whose value is being tracked
target.comment: R5 `Goal.target.measure` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.target.measure`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `Goal.target.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `Goal.target.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R5 `Goal.text` maps as Equivalent to R4 `Goal.text`
